error.name: You must enter a name
error.exists: A game mode with that name already exists

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.step1: Welcome to Bingo Player! With this app, you can forget about pencils and mistakes. Follow these simple steps and get ready to shout BINGO!
welcome.step2: You can use Bingo Player in any situation where bingo is being played in person with printed cards, whether it's a formal or casual event.
welcome.step4: Create and use the game modes
welcome.step5: Mark the numbers that are being announced
